game.name: Whindy 2 In the Caves
game.description:
Whindy is busy enjoying her life full of adventurous and fun activities. However, suddenly a problem comes and the flowers in her area start fading without any explanations. It is a very big problem for her and, in order to sort it out, she is ready to go beyond your imaginations. But, she is not able to complete the activity without your precious helping hands. Are you ready to assist her through the most exciting journey of her life? Join Whindy 2: In the Caves and get ready to show up your inner talent!

The job is really quite difficult, but you can get through all the hurdles only if you face off all of them smartly. In this brand new adventure game for boys, your job is to assist her during the journey that she has to complete to recover the happiness and prosperity of their world. Many surprising difficulties are waiting for you over the passages and caves. Make sure to keep your eyes on the screen to clear the level and score some good points in the end. 

Check out her health and power status at the upper left corner of the screen. Find out the scores at the upper middle part and lives at the upper right corner of the screen. Use X or L to jump on the right time to avoid the danger. You can opt for Z or K for charging invincibility and use space to become invincible. The movement of your character can be taken place using the left/right or A/D keys. Use Down or S to look below and Up or W to enter the door in this cute animal game for kids.
